comments:

forgot to mention.. I did set the MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME prior to running eclipse to
the base directory of mozilla..

exprot MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME=/usr/lib64/mozilla-1.7.3
or
exprot MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME=/usr/lib64/firefox-1.0.1

I think this is a duplicate of bug 84673...

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 84673 ***
